about.botoholt-text: Botoholt is a bot that allows viewers to find song titles(and more) on your stream.
about.connect-text: To connect and use our bot in the future, you just need to log in using Twitch
about.connect-text-2: To connect and use our bot, you must write
about.support-text: If you would like to support the authors of the project with a coin, you are welcome to do so

warning.text: Are you sure you want to exit without saving the new <{{commandName}}> command?
warning.title: You didn't save the new command!

da.action: Paste the link to DonationAlerts widget
da.clue: To find the link to the widget, go to the DA website and navigate to
da.insert-da-link: Paste the link to your DonationAlerts
da.invalid-links: Invalid links. Links must match examples
da.message: Connect DonationAlerts to take song titles directly from there, edit and customize related commands and unlock cool features like top songs, top DJs, and more!
da.title: DonationAlerts connection

integrations.page-description: On this page you can connect various platforms

lang.description: you will only be able to change the language of the bot manually in the future

admin-page.sing-out: Are you sure you want to sign out?

songs.description: On this page you can view the queue and history of songs, as well as DJs and songs tops

support.description: If you have any problems while using Botoholt, you can find the answer to your question here or describe your problem in discord

discord.description: If your question is not answered in the list, please write to Urbinholt in discord
discord.title: There is no answer to my question in the list, who should I contact?

empty.text: Create your first custom command by clicking on the 'Add command' button
empty.title: At the moment, the list of custom commands is empty

connect-bot: Want to add a bot to your stream?
connect-bot-text-1: If you want to connect Botoholt, then just write to

delete-command.text: Are you sure you want to remove the {{command}} command?
delete-command.title: Deleting command

dont-show-link: Don't show the link to anyone

commands.description: Add key names for the command (minimum 1, maximum 10)

edit-commands.empty-command-list: The command list cannot be empty!

scenarios.text-1: One of the responses will be chosen randomly.
scenarios.text-2: Be aware that the variables you use may have different lengths.
scenarios.text-3: Therefore, we do not recommend using multiple identical variables in the same reply, otherwise the message may be cut off (maximum length of a message in twitch chat is 500 characters)
scenarios.title: Response Scenarios

edit-commands.title: Editing

titles.failure-shazam: Responses for unsuccessful song title search
titles.last-faliure: Responses for unsuccessful search of last played song title
titles.last-success-da: Responses for the last played song title if it was played in DonationAlerts
titles.last-success-shazam: Responses for the last played song title if it was found
titles.queue-faliure: Responses if the queue is empty and the songs are paused
titles.queue-success: Responses if the song queue is not empty
titles.success-da-song: Responses for a song playing in DonationAlerts
titles.success-shazam: Responses for a successful song title search
titles.which-faliure: Responses when determining the place in songs queue is unsuccessful
titles.which-success: Responses for successfully locating a place in songs queue

warning.text: Are you sure you want to exit without saving your changes?
warning.title: You didn't save your changes!

login.description: To enter your personal Botoholt account you need to pass authorization
login.title: Personal account

login-page.not-auth: You are not authorized at Botoholtüò™

mod-botoholt.causes: This is necessary for the correct work of the bot. It is also necessary if you have follow or subscribe chatroom, otherwise the bot will simply not be able to send messages to your chatroom
mod-botoholt.plea: Please make Botoholt a moderator in your chatroom with the command

need-da.text: To activate this command you need to connect DonationAlerts!

new-updates.text-1: Release of the admin panel for streamers
new-updates.text-2: Now everyone can independently connect Botoholt

list-is-empty.first: Be the first to order a song!
list-is-empty.top-djs: Top DJs for this period is empty.
list-is-empty.top-songs: Top songs for this period is empty.

streamer-page.not-have-songs: {{login}} has no ordered songs yet. But he has everything ahead!

support-streamer: Want to order a song or support a streamer?

top-emotes.description: Top frequently used BetterTTV, 7TV and FrankerFaceZ emotes in chat

variables-description: To use just click on the desired variable or write by hand
